Job Title: Backend Product Manager - R&D

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Product Management

Description:
Be Part Of Something RevolutionaryAt o9 Solutions, our mission is clear: be the Most Valuable Platform (MVP) for enterprises. With our AI-driven platform — the o9 Digital Brain — we integrate global enterprises’ siloed planning capabilities, helping them capture millions and, in some cases, billions of dollars in value leakage. But our impact doesn’t stop there. Businesses that plan better and faster also reduce waste, which drives better outcomes for the planet, too.We're on the lookout for the brightest, most committed individuals to join us on our mission. Along the journey, we’ll provide you with a nurturing environment where you can be part of something truly extraordinary and make a real difference for companies and the planet.About the role...
As a Backend Product Manager at our company, you will play a pivotal role in shaping our product vision and ensuring its alignment with market trends, competitive landscape, and customer needs. Leveraging your technical expertise you will lead the charge in understanding the individual customer requirements and translating them into functional specifications, use cases, and mock-ups for the development team. Additionally, you will prioritize new features and requirements, advocate best practices with the development team, and ensure that the solution effectively meets the business objectives of the end users. 
What you will do in this role:Understand the market trends, competitive landscape carefully and with the in-depth understanding of our existing product, chalk out the product vision and prioritize the new features and requirementsAct as a domain expert and advocate/implements the best practices with the development teamUnderstand the individual customer requirements carefully and create the Functional specifications, Use cases, mock-ups and other documents required for the development team to get going. Explain functional requirements to the development teamMake sure that the solution that is designed and developed effectively meets the business objectives of the end usersValidate/test the newly developed features and their impact on existing features. Demonstrate these new features to key stakeholders and get their feedbackWork with UX team to create a pleasant user experienceAct as the functional ‘Go-to’ person for the QA teamAct as the hub of the stakeholders for the application, interfacing with the customers, sales, consulting and development teamsProvide product training to internal and external departmentsAct as an SME and reviews the training material and product documentationHelp the sales and pre-sales teams to support RFPs, RFQs, ongoing implementations and customer demos (preparation / delivery)As SME, act as the first respondent for any functional queries / issues from internal / external teams
What you’ll have...Experience: 3-8 years of experience in Product Management, Business Analysis.Experience working within Cloud, SaaS, AI/ML applications will be an added advantageEducation: Degree in Computer Science/Engineering, Business Analytics/Administration, Operations Research, Industrial Engineering/Management, Manufacturing Systems Engineering, Production Engineering, Supply Chain Management, Information Technology, or similar fieldSkills: Excellent understanding of the Supply chain planning domainCharacteristics: A good leader who can communicate the project plans and status of projects effectivelyA self-motivated person who can work calmly under pressure and meet deadlinesExcellent problem-solving, organizational, analytical and influencing skills, with proven ability to take initiativesWe really value team spirit: Transparency and frequent communication is key. At o9, this is not limited by hierarchy, distance, or function
This position at o9 Solutions has an annual salary range of $120,000.00 - $187,000. Additionally, you may be eligible to participate in our medical, retirement, and other company-sponsored benefits.
*The above information reflects the expected base salary range, although the lower and upper bounds may vary based on location, skills, experience, certifications, licenses, or other relevant factors
More about us… With the latest increase in our valuation from $2.7B to $3.7B despite challenging global macroeconomic conditions, o9 Solutions is one of the fastest-growing technology companies in the world today. Our mission is to digitally transform planning and decision-making for the enterprise and the planet. Our culture is high-energy and drives us to aim 10x in everything we do.
Our platform, the o9 Digital Brain, is the premier AI-powered, cloud-native platform driving the digital transformations of major global enterprises including Google, Walmart, ABInBev, Starbucks and many others.
Our headquarters are located in Dallas, with offices in Amsterdam, Paris, London, Barcelona, Madrid, São Paulo, Bengaluru, Tokyo, Seoul, Milan, Stockholm, Sydney, Shanghai, Singapore and Munich.
o9 is an equal opportunity employer and seeks applicants of diverse backgrounds and hires without regard to race, colour, gender, religion, national origin, citizenship, age, sexual orientation or any other characteristic protected by law

Experience Level (if available): Associate
